item.description:
This is NOT a pubcrawl. This is a "PVD bar exploration".

The West End got the most votes. Here's the schedule:

08:00 - 08:50 - Talk of the Town (529 Atwells Ave)
09:00 - 09:50 - Lili Marlene's (422 Atwells Ave; food available)
10:00 - 10:50 - The Avery (18 Luongo Memorial Square)
11:00 - 11:50 - E & O Tap (289 Knight Street)
12:00 - whenever - Scurvy Dog (1718 Westminster Street)

To view all the bars on one map, go here http://maps.google.co...

Drop in or out whenever you want - I'll email my cell phone to all yes and maybe RSVP's the morning of the pubcrawl.

By RSVP-ing yes, you are agreeing to drink responsibly and find a safe ride home!


Cab Companies that I've Used Before

Corporate Taxi - 231-2228
Checker Cab - 944-2000
Big Daddy Taxi - 578-8182
item.how_to_find_us: check out my photo or call me =)
item.name: A Night of Bars
